name: a milky way
description:
Four beaver dad's go on a space mission, to steal milk from the milky way.  On the way back their ship is being hit by asteroids.  Your job is to fix the ship with the wood planks floating around.  Be quick to save the milk and bring it back to your beaver babies.

 

 

 

 

Press on the names to get to their page

 


Context: Global Game Jam 2020 - Dock 18 - Zürich (Switzerland)

Bye bye !
